


RRDLAST(1)                   rrdtool                   RRDLAST(1)


NNNNAAAAMMMMEEEE
       rrdtool last - Return the date of the last data sample in
       an RRRRRRRRDDDD

SSSSYYYYNNNNOOOOPPPPSSSSIIIISSSS
       rrrrrrrrddddttttoooooooollll llllaaaasssstttt _f_i_l_e_n_a_m_e

DDDDEEEESSSSCCCCRRRRIIIIPPPPTTTTIIIIOOOONNNN
       The llllaaaasssstttt function returns the UNIX timestamp when the RRD
       was last updated.

       _f_i_l_e_n_a_m_e
               The name of the RRRRRRRRDDDD that contains the data.

AAAAUUUUTTTTHHHHOOOORRRR
       Russ Wright <rwwright@home.com>









































24/Oct/98                  19990426.22                          1
